original_text: They had stone walls around them. At the bottom of the walls they had made places for fires to burn.
korean_text: 그 작은 네 뜰 사방으로 돌아가며 부엌이 있고 그 사방 부엌에 삶는 기구가 설비되었는데

sentences.original_text: They had stone walls around them.
At the bottom of the walls
they had made places for fires to burn.
